channel.title: Elegit
channel.description: The version control system Git has become popular for developers who track and share code. Elegit is a Git client for people who actually want to learn Git. The goal of this project is to design and build a new Git client for use by students that helps them use Git successfully with a minimum of challenges, likely by use of a subset of Git commands, but also specifically with the goal of helping them learn at a deeper level how Git works.
